title: Active Eats!
description: The goal of this application is to provide users with a comprehensive list of exercises targeting every major muscle group.

title: Weather App
description: With a user friendly interace users will be able to search for any city and be presented with the current and future weather conditions for that city.

title: Note Taker
description: This Note taking application  can make the lives of those who are really busy really easy.Its easy-to-use features help users stay on track.
